stripped_text: +2 mu Whenever you breach HQ during a run, access 1 additional card for each piece of ice protecting HQ that you fully broke during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] Whenever you breach HQ during a run, access 1 additional card for each piece of ice protecting HQ that you fully broke during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
title: The Gauntlet
